page.title: 07Social Survey B-Amenities(1)
page.content: The second question in the Social } Survey was : {"How important is it to {you that the following amenities {should be provided ?" Each opinion was given a score on a 1 to 5 scale of importance. The results were : { { SUGGESTED AMENITY/IMPROVEMENT SCORE more litter bins 379 better young children's play area 373 a youth club for teenagers 369 an adventure playground 355 more trees planted 354 public toilets 348 more garages for residents 319 a bus shelter at Gatefield 318 library van to call more often 318 more public benches 303 more street lighting 299 a public car park 265 a picnic site 229 a BMX cycle track 224
